text: "The Boy in the Iceberg" is the first episode of the Nickelodeon's television series Avatar: The Last Airbender. It was directed by Dave Filoni and written by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. The episode aired on February 21, 2005 on Nickelodeon. In the episode, two villagers from the Southern Water Tribe find a boy trapped in an iceberg. Zuko, the prince of the Fire Nation, wants to take the boy with him, thinking he found the Avatar. The episode had positive reviews.
